articles.author: Susanne Gargiulo, Kim Norgaard, Pierre Meilhan, Jorge Engels, Tara Subramaniam and Jonny Hallam, CNN
articles.title: Suspect in fatal Copenhagen mall shooting is remanded in psychiatric facility for 24 days, police say - CNN
articles.description: A man arrested on suspicion of killing three people and wounding several others during a shooting at a shopping mall in Copenhagen is being remanded in a psychiatric facility for 24 days, Danish police said Monday.
